net.sourceforge.aglets.itinerary
Interface Task

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseTask
public interface Task

This interface defines a single task. A task is a code unit that must be executed depending on the destination.

Version:
1.0 13-set-2005
Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net

Field Summary
static int EXECUTE_ON_ARRIVAL
          Identify a task to be executed on the aglet arrival.
static int EXECUTE_ON_DEFAULT
          Identify a task as to be executed on default, that means always.
static int EXECUTE_ON_DISPATCH
          Identify a task as to be executed on the aglet migration (dispatch).
static int EXECUTE_ON_REVERTERING
          Identify a task as to be executed on retracting of an aglet.
 
Method Summary
 void execute()
          The main method of a task.
 int getExecutionType()
          Indicates the type of execution task, that is the policy this task should be executed.

Method Detail

execute

void execute()
The main method of a task. Place your code to be executed here, this method will be invoked automatically at the right moment.

getExecutionType

int getExecutionType()
Indicates the type of execution task, that is the policy this task should be executed.

Returns:
the type of task.
